message.name: ERR_FV_PERCENTAGE_VALUE
message.locale: Percentage value should not be less than 0 and not more than 100.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: Issue resolution approval check is already canceled.
Issue resolution approval check is already cancelled.

message.name: ERR_FV_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: This issue resolution approval check is already active. Please modify the existing record.

message.name: ERR_RV_NO_MODIFY_RECORD_CANCELLED
message.locale: Issue resolution approval check cannot be modified as it is canceled.
Issue resolution approval check cannot be modified as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECT_ISSUE
message.locale: Issue must be specified if Applies to All Issues has not been selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SELECT_ALLISSUESIND
message.locale: Issue must not be specified if Applies to All Issues has been selected.

message.name: ERR_XRV_ISSUE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This issue has already been canceled. An issue resolution approval check cannot be created for a canceled issue.
This issue has already been cancelled. An issue resolution approval check cannot be created for a cancelled issue.

message.name: ERR_XRV_MODIFY_ISSUE_CANCELLED
message.locale: This issue has already been canceled. An issue resolution approval check cannot be modified for a canceled issue.
This issue has already been cancelled. An issue resolution approval check cannot be modified for a cancelled issue.
